newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Dutch cbank allocates liquidity at unchanged rate.
newsitem.headline: Dutch cbank allocates liquidity at unchanged rate.

text.p: The Dutch central bank said on Friday it had allocated 3.49 billion guilders to the money market under a seven-day special advances pact at an unchanged rate of 2.90 percent.
The central bank awarded individual banks 14.1 percent of the amount they had applied for up to a ceiling of 4.0 billion guilders. Above that level no subscriptions were awarded.
The pact replaces a seven-day facility of 3.31 billion guilders which expired today.
